name: Roller Nights
description:
This is my first game about a roller girl Jess, who likes to roller skate late at night. Use the left mouse button to control everything in this game

In fact, the further I went into development, the more I added some special features, plot, and so on. And all of this led me to a dead end every time, because I'm a beginner. Yeah, that makes sense. So I decided to discard all the complications and release an ordinary runner for the time being. I'll be glad to hear your comments! Thanks!

* At this point in the game there is no settings window.

** Thanks ansimuz for free assets!!
